  - title: "Cutting through the noise: AI enables high-fidelity quantum computing"
    excerpt: "SANKEN researchers achieved over 95% accuracy when reading the output spin states of qubits by implementing machine learning. By using deep neural networks, the team was able to overcome noise in both simulated and real data sets from quantum dots."
